Messages.Author: Kaan Koçaslan
Messages.Content: Dear students,  unfortunately, the exercise today has to be cancelled, we will cover the topics next week. On another note, the first date for the exams will be the 22nd July if you wish to have your exam then, please register by writing to gabler@math.tu-berlin.de or go to her room MA 873. Every one of you got the required points. Also note the changes in the schedule for the last weeks of this semester.   Thanks, Kaan

Messages.Author: Kaan Koçaslan
Messages.Content: Dear all, as promised, we updated Exercise Sheet 5, such that the new Exercise 3 should be easier. You have one more week for this exercise sheet, but do note that there will still be an Exercise sheet 6, so on June 14 both Sheets 5 and 6 have to be handed in.  Best Kaan

Messages.Author: Kaan Koçaslan
Messages.Content: Dear Students, we noticed that Exercise 3 in its current form is too difficult to be solved. We will make changes and I will update this post as soon as we are done. You will then of course have one week to solve the new Exercise, so either the current ones deadline will be prolonged or we will push the updated Exercise on to the next sheet.  Best regards, Kaan

Messages.Author: Kaan Koçaslan
Messages.Content: Dear students, Unfortunately, my consultation hour today has to be cancelled. Feel free to ask any questions in the forum or per e-mail. Best, Kaan

Messages.Author: Kaan Koçaslan
Messages.Content: Dear all,  As mentioned in the exercise, my consultation hour today is cancelled.

Messages.Author: Kaan Koçaslan
Messages.Content: Dear all,  since some of you are required to shift your group choice to join your partners, I opened the group choice again.  If you still don't have a group please write in the forum (best choice) or write me so I can try to arrange something on short notice.  Best regards Kaan

Messages.Author: Kaan Koçaslan
Messages.Content: Dear all,  since nobody expressed any concerns, the exercise on thursday will begin at 8.30, starting tomorrow.  Sorry for the late message! See you tomorrow

Messages.Author: Kaan Koçaslan
Messages.Content: Dear all, since not all of you were able to form groups of three on your own, I will now pair the groups randomly. Groups 1 and 10 are now Group 10. Groups 11 and 9 are now Group 9. Please write me an E-Mail so I can pass on your contact information to your new partners.  Final groups: I will only accept solutions from Groups 2,3,5,7,9,10,12,14,20.  As always if you have any questions, feel free to write me an E-Mail

Discussions.Discussion_Name: Sprechstunde morgen entfällt/Consultation hour tomorrow cancelled

Messages.Author: Kaan Koçaslan
Messages.Content: Liebe Studenten, meine Sprechstunde morgen muss leider krankheitsbedingt ausfallen. Ihr könnt mir gerne eine Mail schreiben, falls ihr schon Fragen habt (oder natürlich im Matheforum). Die Übung am Donnerstag findet planmäßig statt.  Dear students, my consultation hour tomorrow is cancelled due to sickness. Feel free to write me a mail, if you have any questions (or of course in the forum for mathematical questions). The exercise on Thursday takes place as planned.
